abstract.text: Swift JSON-Codable datatypes to support communicating with an OBS
server using the obs-websocket protocol.
Response to “Gets the status of the stream output.”
Response to “Starts the record output.”
Response to “Stops the virtualcam output.”
Response to “Gets the audio balance of an input.”

to all WebSocket clients. Receivers are clients which are identified and subscribed.”

button in studio mode.”
